title: [COMPLETE]Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.6 - 26/03/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 26/03/15, starting at 03:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.6. At 05:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. 
We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

The approximate size of this patch is ~223mb

-ToxicHawk

replies.body:
Riot letting you guys know.
That since this patch my games randomly spike up.
It not my net, I looked into that.
It only happens when im in a game where my Ping and FPS is fine but I would lose like 2-4 seconds sometimes.

Also while im here a few bugs I would like to address.
1, Sion still looses HP while dead, and under bards Ult.
-If the jungle camps wont reset and not gain HP then Sion should not lose HP while dead and under stasis.
2, I seem to be having these issues where I am unable to see enemy morgana Q's.
And to the point where her hit boxes "Hit me" when they shouldn't have.
I have the exact same problem with the spikes. I've never had a serious problem with ping but since this patch, about every other game give or take, my ping is fine then hits anywhere from 600-1000.

So my update gets stuck at 0.69MB (perfect, right) when I encounter an error message stating "Unspecified error has occurred, please check the logs for more information". I've tried 'turning it off and on again" (I.T. Crowd anyone?) to no success. Anyone else encountering a similar issue, any fixes that are known?

After a lot of time going through all of the instructions on the patching issues support page, nothing changed. Being something of an amazing genius, however, I applied my formidable intellect to the problem and discovered a solution. I turned on my VPN. So it turns out that my custom item sets got deleted for nothing...
Ey Riot; Any idea on when in the update URF Mode will be available to play?
Could be for April Fools. I mean, there are urf icons in 5.6 so...

Looks like it's now been announced:
> For the past year, you've reminded us over and over (and over) of **something we once released**. You bombarded everything from Twitter to telegraphs and overwhelmed computer repair shops with shattered caps lock keys.
Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-preview/youre-cordially-invited-soiree

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=qHETFpTG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-25T09:29:17.972+0000)
>
> Could be for April Fools. I mean, there are urf icons in 5.6 so...

6 days to go for April fools for OCE when the patch hits
what if all the summoners icons, models and teasers are the actual april fools joke, to build hype for urf then not release it.

i cant even sign in because this patch and it broke my chat again all i can do is type little white blocks. also the lag is really bad its not my internet because my ping is at 30 and fps are at 60 and i keep dced and my champion stops but the time is still running and everyone is moving but me.
Please help me?
